price: Àwọn obìnrin tí kì í wo ọkùnrin mìíràn wà nínú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra. Ènìyàn àti àlùjànnú kan kò sì fọwọ́ kàn wọ́n rí ṣíwájú wọn.
arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fīhinna qāṣirātu al-ṭarfi lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
